description: Junkpile is a fictional character in Marvel Comics's 2099 universe, a look at superheroes in the year 2099. He was one of the main antagonists of a future incarnation of the X-Men called X-Men 2099, and briefly was affiliated with both the X-Men and SHIELD.
name: Junkpile
powers: unique physiology allows him to construct his body entirely out of metal which grants him increased strength
bond metal objects to himself to add to his body or rebuild himself
